mainHero.title: Welcome to the
mainHero.subtitle: Pengin Club
mainHero.description: Pengin is a collection of 3,333 Penguin NFTs—unique digital collectibles living on the Ethereum blockchain.

about.title: Welcome to the Club

items.title: Rarity
items.description: Each Pengin is generated randomly using all the traits, so each Pengins is unique in their own ways. However, some Pengins are more unique than others. If you’re lucky, you might get a legendary trait!

items.title: The Pengins
items.description: The Pengins are stored as ERC-721 tokens on the Ethereum blockchain and hosted on IPFS. Purchasing an Pengin costs 0.02 ETH.

about.bannerDescription: To get your Pengin, Mint it now or check out the collection on OpenSea.

features.title: Pengin Club
features.subtitle: Verified Smart Contract Address

items.description: Fair launch. All Pengin cost 0.02 ETH
Ownership and commercial usage rights given to the consumer over their NFT
Gain additional benefits through roadmap activations

features.traitsSubtitle: 30+ Hand Crafted Traits Ranging From Backgrounds, Head Accessories, Hand Accessories & More!
